articles.content: Tiger Shroff has followed in the footsteps of his War co-star Hrithik Roshan. The Ganapath star and producer Jackky Bhagnani took a metro ride to reach a promotional event of their film. However, the… [+2027 chars]

articles.author: Entertainment Desk
articles.title: Aditya Chopra stepped in at the last minute to help complete KKHH’s ‘Ladki Badi Anjani Hai’, Lalit Pandit calls it ‘the most difficult song’ - The Indian Express
articles.description: Lalit Pandit, who co-composed the music of Karan Johar's debut film Kuch Kuch Hota Hai, shared an intriguing anecdote about the song 'Ladki Badi Anjani Hai' and Aditya Chopra's role in the making of the song.
articles.content: The brief yet impactful collaboration between director Karan Johar and music composer duo Jatin-Lalit left an indelible mark on the Hindi film industry, shaping the musical tastes of an entire genera… [+2236 chars]

articles.title: Watch: Meet Bros Perform 'Maadi' Garba Song written By PM Modi - NDTV
articles.description: PM Modi on Saturday attended the 125th Founders' Day celebrations at The Scindia School in Madhya Pradesh's Gwalior. During the event, as a special gesture, the musical duo Meet Bros presented a special song for the Prime Minister.
articles.content:
Meet Bros sang the Garba song penned by PM Modi himself.
Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Saturday attended the 125th Founders' Day celebrations at The Scindia School in Madhya Pradesh's Gwalior. Dur… [+2420 chars]

articles.title: Chinese sci-fi writer Hai Ya wins Hugo Award for Best Novelette - CGTN
articles.description: "The Space-Time Painter," written by Chinese writer Hai Ya, won the Hugo Award for Best Novelette at the 81st World Science Fiction Convention (WorldCon), hosted in the southwestern Chinese city of Chengdu.
